1000000100011100 1111001101110110 0 -> sum: 0111010010010010, cout: 1

0101001110101111 0110011010001110 1 -> sum: 1011101000111110, cout: 0
1111110100110011 0001101011110101 1 -> sum: 0001100000101001, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
